body:
We request federal legislation be amended or created which entitles a mother to breastfeed her child and/or pump breast milk in any public, educational, or workplace location wherein the mother is otherwise permitted, regardless of age, employer or student and/or employment status.

We ask that all employers and educational institutions be required to provide reasonable break time and a non-bathroom, private space which is free from intrusion for all breastfeeding mothers present.

We also ask penalties be put in place for those institutions and employers who do not uphold this legislation.

For more information, please visit http://www.mommatraumablog.com/1/post/2013/02/help-create-all-inclusive-legislation-for-breastfeeding-moms.html
title: Allow all breastfeeding moms the right to pump and nurse when needed
